subject: Hockey, Ice
Sports Injuries
Concussions
Officiating (Sports)
Depression (Mental)
lead_paragraph: Almost four years after sustaining severe head injuries in an N.H.L. game, the former linesman Pat Dapuzzo is working as a scout for the Maple Leafs. He continues to deal with depression.
snippet: Almost four years after sustaining severe head injuries in an N.H.L. game, the former linesman Pat Dapuzzo is working as a scout for the Maple Leafs. He continues to deal with depression.
